section: The duration of this Venture (the "Term") will begin on March 1, 2020 and continue in full force and effect until February 28, 2025, unless terminated earlier by mutual agreement of the Managers.
explanation: The term states that the venture will continue until February 28, 2025, but later mentions that the agreement can be terminated earlier by mutual agreement of the Managers. This creates a contradiction between a fixed term and an early termination option, making the actual duration uncertain.

section: The Managers will jointly decide major issues concerning the Venture. Where Managers are unable to reach agreement in deciding major issues, approval by a majority vote of the Managers will be required.
explanation: The managers have to make joint decision, but then the text says that if they cannot reach an agreement on the decision, it will require a majority vote of the managers. This is contradictory and structurally flawed.

section: Capital Contributions may be amended from time to time, according to the requirements of the Venture, by decision of the Managers. Where Members' interests are affected, additional capital contributions (the "Additional Capital Contributions") must have the unanimous consent of the Managers.
explanation: The initial statement mentions that changes can be made via decision of the managers, however in the very next sentence, it states that it will require unanimous consent. This introduces contradicting requirements for amending capital contributions. This conflict creates uncertainty about the process.
